Description:
Monitoring security cameras and other surveillance equipment to detect and prevent unauthorized activities.
Surveilling security cameras and other monitoring equipment to identify and deter unauthorized activities.
Carrying out routine patrols and inspections to ensure the well-being and security of individuals and property.
Conducting searches of people and property as required, in strict accordance with relevant laws and policies.Skills
Skills:
Knowledge of relevant laws, regulations, and policies related to security, including those related to search and seizure.
Familiarity with pertinent laws, regulations, and policies pertaining to security, including those regarding search and seizure.
Superior communication and interpersonal abilities, fostering effective interactions with people from various backgrounds.
Awareness of relevant laws, regulations, and policies related to security, including those governing search and seizure procedures.
